settings.title: Frustrated wearing a mask that steams up your glasses?
settings.content: Chances are, you’re someone who has found your glasses fogging up when you’re wearing a face mask. Isn't it so frustrating trying to read the labels at your local supermarket through a hazy mist?

settings.title: How does MistyClip work?
settings.content:
Simply slide your MistyClip onto the top edge of your face mask,
pop on your mask and glasses. 

And breathe.

Crystal clear, really.

settings.quote: Used my MistyClip for the first time yesterday and there was no fogging on my glasses at all! Am incredibly pleased with it, highly recommend MistyClip.

settings.title: We care about the environment
settings.content:
Each MistyClip is produced using renewable resources and by-products from the food industry, including corn starch, coffee grounds or finely ground mussel shells, rather than petroleum-based products.

Even the packaging we use to send your MistyClips to you is made from 50% recycled material using paper from responsible resources.

settings.quote: Just received my Mistyclip and I am thrilled to bits! It makes life so much easier.

settings.title: We care about local businesses
settings.content: We genuinely care about the local economy, and the impact of the Covid pandemic on jobs.  Every MistyClip purchased is helping to provide employment for a small number of people.

settings.quote: Brilliant and genius device - received mine after accidentally seeing them on a BBC news bulletin! These work so well!

settings.title: We care about others
settings.content: For every MistyClip sold, we donate a percentage of our profit to Trelis, a Sussex-based charity providing employment skills for homeless and unemployed individuals.

settings.title: What have you got to lose?
settings.content:
